I'm new to the forums, and mods in general, so go easy on me If it's an idiotic post

I'll just keep it short and sweet. I downloaded and installed B9, made a quick little ship then tried to fly it, took off then switched SAS on, the aircraft pulled hard left and down into a role, and kept rolling.

After this I decided to make a totally stock aircraft to see if that made any difference, nope, same thing.

So yeah, sorry once again if it's an idiotic post, or a know issue.

Thanks.

Welcome to the forums!

This sounds like it's not a mod issue per se, but maybe a control issue. When you fly rockets, do they do the same thing?
